input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Downswept Douglas Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
This Downswept Douglas tree features Feel Real branch tip technology, creating a tree with remarkable realism. These crush-resistant branch tips are molded from real tree branches for an authentic living tree appearance. This tree is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy metal tree stand is included.

This Downswept Douglas Fir Full Pre-Lit Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6.5 feet tall with a 49 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of Feel Real individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and fee
Features 650 clear lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on the tree before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Company 7.5 ft. Feel-Real Downswept Douglas Slim Fir Tree with Clear Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Downswept Douglas Fir Tree with Clear Lights 12''
  - Name='Kelly Clarkson Home Fraser Fir Pre-Lit Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Charlton Home 2. Tall Pre-Lit Douglas Fir Tabletop Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Vickerman 6.5' x 50" Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with Warm White LED Lights'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Tall Prelit Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Ft Pre-Lit Snow-Flocked Slim Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree With Realistic Branches, LED S And Tips Ophelia & Co'
  - Name='Green Alcott 6' Tall Prelit Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Gulzamira 5.5' Lighted Fir Christmas Tree'
  - Name='7.5' Tall Prelit Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Haddison 6.5' Lighted Fir Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 7ft Unlit Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Alcott Hill 6ft Tall Douglas Fir Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Winston Porter 2. Tall Pre-Lit Douglas Fir Tabletop Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='WELLFOR 6-Feet Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree with Lights CM-HJY-23732US'
  - Name='Forclover 6-Feet Pre-lit Artificial Christmas Tree with LED Lights HYFASDCM17'
  - Name='Full Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree With Realistic Branches And Flashing LED Lights Alcott Hill'
  - Name='HLILish Pre-Lit Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill BH Balsam Fir Flip Tree'
  - Name='Charlton Home Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='6Ft Pre-Lit Snow-Flocked Slim Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree With Realistic Branches, 250 LED Lights And 462 Tips The Holiday Aisle'
  - Name='Gerson 6 Ft. Prelit Warm White LED Pop Up Fir Tree'
  - Name='Best Choice Products Pre-Lit Partially Flocked Pencil Christmas Tree w/ 2-in-1 Multicolor Lights'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Easy Set-Up Lighted Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Best Choice Products Pre-Lit Sparse Christmas Tree w 2-in-1 LED Lights'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 7.5 ft. Feel-Real Downswept Douglas Slim Fir Tree with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Also from National Tree, features Feel-Real technology, Downswept Douglas Fir variety, pre-lit with clear lights, very similar product with slight height and slim style differences.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Kelly Clarkson Home Fraser Fir Pre-Lit Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit artificial fir tree like reference, but Fraser Fir species differs from Douglas Fir, and brand and possibly construction differ.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Charlton Home 2. Tall Pre-Lit Douglas Fir Tabletop Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Douglas Fir and pre-lit matches reference, but only 2 feet tall, clearly tabletop and smaller scale.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vickerman 6.5' x 50" Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with Warm White LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same height, Douglas Fir species, pre-lit (LED lights), similar size and silhouette; unclear if branch construction or feel-real technology matches, but very close.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Tall Prelit Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Tall pre-lit Douglas Fir tree, apparently full size but lacks mention of feel-real or hinged branches; similar basic product though details unclear.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Ft Pre-Lit Snow-Flocked Slim Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree With Realistic Branches, LED S And Tips Ophelia & Co
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit slim Douglas Fir with realistic branches similar, but snow-flocked finish and slightly different focus on appearance; reasonably close but fewer details to confirm exact match.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Green Alcott 6' Tall Prelit Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit Christmas tree at 6 ft, but no specific mention of species or downswept design; less clearly similar to reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Gulzamira 5.5' Lighted Fir Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Lighted fir tree, but smaller height (5.5 ft) and unspecified fir variety; less specific overlap with reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 7.5' Tall Prelit Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Generic product name with no fir species or downswept style or brand identified; less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Haddison 6.5' Lighted Fir Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same height, lighted fir tree, but no details on downswept style, branch tips, or brand; moderately similar.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 7ft Unlit Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same species and similar size, but unlit and other technology features (hinged branches, feel real) unknown; moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Alcott Hill 6ft Tall Douglas Fir Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: 6 ft pre-lit Douglas Fir tree aligns well with reference in species and lighting, though lacks mention of downswept or Feel Real technology.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Winston Porter 2. Tall Pre-Lit Douglas Fir Tabletop Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Small 2 ft pre-lit Douglas Fir tabletop tree, similar type but much smaller scale.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: WELLFOR 6-Feet Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree with Lights CM-HJY-23732US
scores_with_rationales.rationale: 6 ft pre-lit artificial tree but lacks species or downswept style info, making relevancy moderate.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Forclover 6-Feet Pre-lit Artificial Christmas Tree with LED Lights HYFASDCM17
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same height and pre-lit with LEDs but unspecified fir species or downswept style; somewhat relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Full Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree With Realistic Branches And Flashing LED Lights Alcott Hill
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Full-bodied Douglas Fir with realistic branches, pre-lit with flashing LEDs; very similar in species and construction but flashing lights differ from steady clear lights.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: HLILish Pre-Lit Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit Douglas Fir tree, similar species and lighting but less detail on branch technology or style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill BH Balsam Fir Flip Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar premium artificial tree with hinged branches (flip), but Balsam Fir species differs from Douglas Fir; moderate relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Charlton Home Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Generic artificial Christmas tree with no species, height, or lighting details; low relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 6Ft Pre-Lit Snow-Flocked Slim Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree With Realistic Branches, 250 LED Lights And 462 Tips The Holiday Aisle
scores_with_rationales.rationale: 6 ft pre-lit slim Douglas Fir with realistic branches and lights; close to reference but snow-flocked coating and fewer lights affects exact match.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Gerson 6 Ft. Prelit Warm White LED Pop Up Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: 6 ft pre-lit fir tree with warm white LEDs and pop up design; likely different branch construction than hinged, but similar function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Best Choice Products Pre-Lit Partially Flocked Pencil Christmas Tree w/ 2-in-1 Multicolor Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit pencil (very slim) style tree with color-changing lights and flocking, significantly different silhouette and lighting style than reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Easy Set-Up Lighted Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Easy set-up and lighted tree sounds similar in function but lacks species, size or style info to confirm closeness.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Best Choice Products Pre-Lit Sparse Christmas Tree w 2-in-1 LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Sparse tree with 2-in-1 LED lights differs sharply in fullness and lighting type, less similar to full-bodied downswept Douglas Fir.
